required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Evaluate Whether BLI-489 Can be Safely Tolerated by Healthy Subjects Given Multiple Doses
clinical_study.official_title: Ascending Multiple Dose Study of the Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetics of BLI-489 Administered Intravenously to Healthy Subjects

lead_sponsor.agency: Wyeth is now a wholly owned subsidiary of Pfizer

clinical_study.source: Wyeth is now a wholly owned subsidiary of Pfizer

brief_summary.textblock: To determine the safety, tolerability, and drug absorption profile of multiple IV doses of BLI 489 in healthy subjects.

primary_outcome.measure: Assess safety of drug given to healthy subjects by evaluating any reported adverse events (AEs), scheduled physical examinations, vital sign measurements, 12-lead ECGs, and clinical laboratory test results.

overall_official.affiliation: Wyeth is now a wholly owned subsidiary of Pfizer

responsible_party.name_title: Wyeth (Registry Contact: Clinical Trial Registry Specialist)
